publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4758 Ken Macintosh: The Children’s Hearings (Legal Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2009—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Children’s Hearings (Legal Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2009 (SSI 2009/211). Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-4758 Ken Macintosh: The Children’s Hearings (Legal Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2009—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Children’s Hearings (Legal Representation) (Scotland) Amendment Rules 2009 (SSI 2009/211).
